Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Production Management Supervisor  (Full-time position, at leat 5 years experience)
              
              - Production Management Staff (Full-time position, at least 3 years experience)
              
              The person will engage in all important matters related to products such as production management (QCD).
              

              Selection Process
              
              - CV apply deadline : 30-Jun-2018
              
              - CV screening
              
              - Attend Seminar and 3 round of interview at Uniqlo Vietnam Office:
              
              1st Seminar on 12-May-2018
              
              2nd Seminar on 9-Jun-2018
              
              3rd Seminar on 14-Jul-2018
              

              ***Only candidate passed CV screening round will be invited to seminar and interview.

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Education/Experience
              
              - University graduate, all majors welcome (prior to apparel industy)
              
              - Production management, MD, Inspetion Experience at least 3 years (prior to Textile, Garment).
              

              Language
              
              - Skills English or Japanese Business Communication Level
              

              Qualifications
              
              - Leadership abilitty.
              
              - Interested in production field, garment.
              
              - Business trip by bus/airplane to factory in Vietnam, Cambodia, Thailand every week
              

              Location
              
              SUNWAH Tower, Room 608- 6F, 115 Nguyen Hue, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
              

              Salary
              
              - Base Salary: TBA
              
              - Bonus: twice a year
              
              - Double Pay
              

              Benefits
              
              - 24/24 Insurance (In Vietnam) & Travel trip insurance
              
              - Healthcare insurance, social insurance & unemployment insurance ( as Government )
              
              - Transport allowance
              
              - Company Provided iPhone.
              
              - Training & Business trip in Japan.
              
              - Japanese Language Course provided by company.
              
              - Annual Company Trip
              
              - End of year party
